projects.name: This Portfolio Web Application
projects.description:
I designed the code architecture for this portfolio website and built it from ground up using Angular Framework , 

I open sourced the code and uploaded it to github so that other people can use it for their portfolios. 

URL is https://github.com/ronald-hove/Angular-Portfolio-Template

projects.name: Villa Hout Bay Heights Guest House Website
projects.description:
I worked on this website from ground up using Angular Framework , Firebase as well as a SQL backend 

The site is a guest house booking site to place booking enquiries 

URL is http://houtbayheights.co.za/
